amendment.description: To require that Iraqi oil revenues be used to pay for reconstruction in Iraq.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1826 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 39. Record Vote Number: 380.
Amendment SA 1826 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S12427-14233; text: CR S12427) To require that Iraqi oil revenues be used to pay for reconstruction in Iraq.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1826 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 39. Record Vote Number: 380.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1826 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
